inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: peak GH concentration ≥10 ng/mL to GH provocative tests such as Arginine Insulin Tolerance Test (AITT) or Arginine Clonidine Tolerance Test (ACTT)

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: breast bulb were in stage 1 with no course hair in the pubic or axillary

exclusion.criterion: Medical history of a neurologic, endocrinologic, genetic, or metabolic problem known to have a direct effect on height growth
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is an obese, mentally retarded girl with Turner syndrome. She is treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy.
